mapper.insert: insert into learnexplain (exercise_id,learnExplain_which_day, learnExplain_type, learnExplain_imgPath, learnExplain_voicePath, learnExplain_score, learnExplain_voiceName) values(#{exerciseId}, #{learnExplainWhichDay}, #{learnExplainType}, #{learnExplainImgPath}, #{learnExplainVoicePath}, #{learnExplainScore}, #{learnExplainVoiceName});
mapper.select: select t.learnExplain_id, t.learnExplain_which_day, t.learnExplain_type, t.learnExplain_score, t.learnExplain_imgPath, t.learnExplain_voicePath, t.learnExplain_voiceName, t.create_time, t.exercise_id from learnexplain t;

select t.learnExplain_id, t.learnExplain_which_day, t.learnExplain_type, t.learnExplain_score, t.learnExplain_imgPath, t.learnExplain_voicePath, t.learnExplain_voiceName, t.create_time, t.exercise_id from learnexplain t where t.learnExplain_id=#{id};
mapper.update: Update learnexplain t set t.learnExplain_which_day= #{learnExplainWhichDay}, t.learnExplain_type= #{learnExplainType}, t.learnExplain_score= #{learnExplainScore}, t.learnExplain_imgPath= #{learnExplainImgPath}, t.learnExplain_voicePath= #{learnExplainVoicePath}, t.learnExplain_voiceName= #{learnExplainVoiceName}, t.exercise_id = #{exerciseId} where t.learnExplain_id = #{learnExplainId};
